titleStmt.title: A common-wealth of women a play : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal, by Their Majesties servants / by Mr. D'Urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. Sea voyage.
Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640. Sea voyage.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley ... and J. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: An alteration of "The sea voyage", a play ascribed to Fletcher and Massinger.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
